Summary: Red/Orange object with wings and globe in Downtown Kansas City
divs: sighting detailse-mail received by asd today - i have replied and am awaiting a return call for more information. i just saw an orange\red probe flying over midtown, kc. my office is 11th floor of 3100 broadway. looking south, one flew just north of the vfw building. kind of looked like a bird - kind of flapping and turning, but really was gliding. was metallic in that the sun would glint off the wings. more of a globe\ball on the bottom. it flew at about the 14th floor level is my guess. flew from west to east. what are these things doing? i saw a white globe a couple of months ago hanging out in south kansas city. very high. maybe a satellite but it never seemed to move. hung there for 1-2 hours at least and then i left work so not sure how long it was up. anyway, just thought if you are tracking, i should report. i've never been this close - literally a block as a crow flies (haha) and eye level almost.
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around September 30th 2011
